Headline: Green Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Green Line is temporarily suspended due to a track condition.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Green Line has been temporarily suspended due to a track condition.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible.

We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to track conditions.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to track conditions. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.
